title: I.Sicily inscription 003325
support: Three quadrangular slabs originally from the crepidoma of the west side of the great north stoa, but reused for the crepidoma of the annex to the podium temple on the west side of the agora, and inscribed in that context.

date._: second half of the 1st century BCE (Ampolo - Erdas)

provenanceFound._: Agora, Found during excavations in 1995, US 4558

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

location.address: Case Barbaro - contrada Barbaro S.R. 22, 91013 Calatafimi
